project.name: C-C761A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C761A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
